div.p: This implementation guide describes Clinical Decsion Support (CDS) for preventive care screening and personalized, patient-directed care plans.

The U.S. Preventive Services Task Force is an independent, volunteer panel of national experts in disease prevention and evidence-based medicine. The Task Force works to improve the health of all Americans by making evidence-based recommendations about clinical preventive services. Refer to the Latest Guidelines for additional details.
Additional detail/context setting for those who have significant background in the domain. (Try to make as understandable as you can, but set important context).

ul.li: Background - provides business context for the implementation guide and information that implementers should be familiar with before reading the remainder of the IG. There could be multiple pages for this.
